name: Pein Hammer
description: Drop forged from high grade carbon steel.Phosphated and painted to provide anti rusting properties.

name: Mallet Hammer
description: The long and natural hardwood handle of the Hammer provides enough firm and comfortable grip. The plastic made relatively larger head fitted at one end of the handle have a striking yet softer face.

name: Hammer Head
description: Head drop forged made from high grade steel.Head differentially heat treated to ensure safe use.

name: Sledge Hammer
description: Head drop forged made from high grade steel.Head differentially heat treated to ensure safe use.

name: Shaft Claw Hammer
description: Stanley Claw Hammer individually pass through heat treatment for the assurance of long life. Apart from the heat treatment, for extra strength, the tubular steel shaft clears the stages of hardening and tempering as well.

name: Shaft Camp Axe
description: These Axes are equipped with sturdy and robust hammerhead attached with two wedges that better long-lasting assurance as well.

name: Glass Handle Sledge Hammer
description: The Baum 243A - 16lb CNC Machined Fibber Glass Handle Sledge Hammer is a heavy-duty tool used to break down stones or metal objects in constructional areas. The 16lb CNC Machined Fibber Glass Handle Sledge Hammer is a heavy-duty hammer used for demolition jobs where high force is required.

name: Cross Pein Hammer
description: Drop forged from high grade carbon steel.Phosphated and painted to provide anti rusting properties.
